films.title: Double Indemnity
films.desc: An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of an insurance investigator.
films.stars: Fred MacMurray, Barbara Stanwyck, Edward G. Robinson

films.title: Sunset Boulevard
films.desc: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.
films.stars: William Holden, Gloria Swanson, Erich von Stroheim

films.title: The Third Man
films.desc: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.
films.stars: Orson Welles, Joseph Cotten, Alida Valli

films.title: In a Lonely Place
films.desc: A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. However, she soon starts to have her doubts.
films.stars: Humphrey Bogart, Gloria Grahame, Frank Lovejoy

films.title: Touch of Evil
films.desc: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.
films.stars: Charlton Heston, Orson Welles, Janet Leigh

films.title: Out of the Past
films.desc: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses and duplicitous dames.
films.stars: Robert Mitchum, Jane Greer, Kirk Douglas

films.title: White Heat
films.desc: A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.
films.stars: James Cagney, Virginia Mayo, Edmond O'Brien

films.title: The Big Heat
films.desc: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.
films.stars: Glenn Ford, Gloria Grahame, Jocelyn Brando

films.title: Sweet Smell of Success
films.desc: Powerful but unethical Broadway columnist J.J. Hunsecker coerces unscrupulous press agent Sidney Falco into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.
films.stars: Burt Lancaster, Tony Curtis, Susan Harrison

films.title: The Big Sleep
films.desc: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.
films.stars: Humphrey Bogart, Lauren Bacall, John Ridgely

films.title: Gilda
films.desc: A small-time gambler hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino discovers his employer's new wife is his former lover.
films.stars: Rita Hayworth, Glenn Ford, George Macready

films.title: The Maltese Falcon
films.desc: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.
films.stars: Humphrey Bogart, Mary Astor, Gladys George
